// TEXT UI entrypoint (not the JavaFX launcher)
// Exclude JavaFX launcher & GUI so build doesn’t require OpenJFX
# AI Assistance in Bob the TaskBot
This project used AI tools to assist in development:
- Adding new features (e.g., `edit` command for C-Update).
> Duke is a simple chatbot that helps you manage tasks such as Todos, Deadlines, and Events from the command line.
1. Ensure you have **Java 11 or above** installed.
A simple chatbot that helps you keep track of tasks, deadlines, and events — with a friendly text-based or GUI interface.
